## Description {#details}

Helper to hold state needed for unrolling.

It holds the Plan to unroll by UF. It also holds copies of VPValues across UF-1 unroll parts to facilitate the unrolling transformation, where the original VPValues are retained for part zero.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanunroll-cpp">VPlanUnroll.cpp</a>.

### unrollHeaderPHIByUF() {#aa773bd1bfec647796608e37830e153c8}

Unroll header phi recipe <code>R</code>.

How exactly the recipe gets unrolled depends on the concrete header phi. Inserts newly created recipes at <code>InsertPtForPhi</code>.
